mapper.select: select trim(cid) as cid, cname, COALESCE (supervise, '') as supervise, COALESCE (orgrelation, '') as orgrelation, COALESCE (prodesc, '') as prodesc, COALESCE (prolist, '') as prolist from tb_common_company_list where cid=#{cid}

select trim(projectid) as projectid, trim(cid) as cid, COALESCE (projectname, '') as projectname, COALESCE (tendername, '') as tendername, to_char(TO_TIMESTAMP(tendertime/1000), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as tendertime, COALESCE (tenderphone, '') as tenderphone, COALESCE (tendercompany, '') as tendercompany, COALESCE (projecttype, '') as projecttype, COALESCE (mail, '') as mail, COALESCE (tenderresultcompany, '') as tenderresultcompany, COALESCE (tenderagent, '') as tenderagent, COALESCE (agentphone, '') as agentphone, COALESCE (porjcetra, '') as porjcetra, COALESCE (relation, '') as relation from tb_company_project where projectid=#{projectid} limit #{pagesize} offset #{pageno}

select trim(projectid) as projectid, COALESCE (lineuid,'') as lineuid, COALESCE (lineuname,'') as lineuname, COALESCE (linephone,'') as linephone, COALESCE (lineage,0) as lineage, COALESCE (linesex,'') as linesex, COALESCE (linejob,'') as linejob, COALESCE (linenature,'') as linenature, COALESCE (des,'') as des, COALESCE (idx,-1) as idx, COALESCE (podeperson,'') as podeperson, COALESCE (podephone,'') as podephone, COALESCE (podejob,'') as podejob, COALESCE (podenature,'') as podenature, COALESCE (npodeperson,'') as npodeperson, COALESCE (npodephone,'') as npodephone, COALESCE (npodejob,'') as npodejob, COALESCE (npodenature,'') as npodenature, COALESCE (setb,'') as setb, COALESCE (sepr,'') as sepr, COALESCE (setli,'') as setli, COALESCE (relation,'') as relation, COALESCE (recname,'') as recname, COALESCE (reluname,'') as reluname, COALESCE (relphone,'') as relphone, COALESCE (brandname,'') as brandname, COALESCE (contrast,'') as contrast, COALESCE (mail,'') as mail, COALESCE (nreluname,'') as nreluname, COALESCE (nrelphone,'') as nrelphone, COALESCE (nbrandname,'') as nbrandname, COALESCE (ncontrast,'') as ncontrast, COALESCE (nmail,'') as nmail, COALESCE (reshid,'') as reshid, COALESCE (reshname,'') as reshname, COALESCE (reshphone,'') as reshphone, adduid, addtime, upduid, updtime, COALESCE (lineuid,'') as status, COALESCE (summary,'') as summary from tb_common_project_info where projectid=#{projectid} limit #{pagesize} offset #{pageno}
select count(1) from tb_common_project_info where projectid=#{projectid}
select COALESCE(projectname,'' )as projectname from tb_company_project where projectid=#{projectid}
select cid,cname,supervise,orgrelation,prodesc,COALESCE(prolist,'') as prolist from tb_common_company_list where cid=#{cid}
select projectid,projectname from tb_company_project where cid=#{cid}

select projectid,cid,projectname,tendername,tenderphone,tendertime,tenderphone,tendercompany,projecttype,mail as promail,tenderresultcompany,tenderagent,agentphone,porjcetra,relation from tb_company_project where projectid=#{projectId}

select projectid, lineuname, linephone, linejob, linenature, podeperson, podephone, podejob, podenature, npodeperson, npodephone, npodejob, npodenature, setb, sepr, setli, relation, recname, reluname, relphone, brandname, contrast, mail, nreluname, nrelphone, nbrandname, ncontrast, nmail, reshid, reshname, reshphone from tb_common_project_info where projectid=#{projectId}
